config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration is used as a parameter when creating a new PersistentJournal object in the journal() method. It is passed as an argument along with other parameters to initialize the PersistentJournal object.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration is triggered whenever the journal() method is called, which depends on the logic of the application. The frequency of triggering can vary based on how often the journal() method is invoked.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration impacts the size threshold for the journal in the system. It determines the maximum size that the journal can reach before triggering certain actions or behaviors within the PersistentJournal object. This configuration option can affect the performance and storage usage of the system.
